## NS.asleep() method

Suspends the script for n milliseconds. Doesn't block with concurrent calls.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
asleep(millis: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  millis | number | Number of milliseconds to sleep. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;


## Remarks

RAM cost: 0 GB
